author: Simon Kent, Simon Kent
title: U.N. Chief Demands Immediate 'Global Ceasefire' (and $2 Billion) to Help Fight Coronavirus
description: The United Nations Secretary-General António Guterres on Monday demanded the world end all wars and instead join the fight against the "common enemy" of coronavirus. He also called for $2 billion to be transferred from wealthy countries to the poor via the gl…
content: The United Nations Secretary-General António Guterres on Monday demanded the world end all wars and instead join the fight against the “common enemy” of coronavirus. He also called for $2 billion to be transferred from wealthy countries to the poor via the gl… [+1852 chars]
